item.title: Projects
item.description: 2019 Poetics 2 (actor, lead) Shakespeare, Cervantes, Swift, Chapelle. Each had fragments.. Moments before Seth Rogen is killed, his assistant delivers a mysterious message to a pair of young classicists at an academic conference. This message, a baffling riddle hidden inside Whoâ€™s On First, sets them on a trail of clues, hidden in famous works of comedy, that will deliver them to one of the best-kept secrets in history… and unimaginable power.
